example.eg: Thanks to my good friend Ellen, I got to the airport on time.  Thanks to the heavy curtains on my windows, I'm able to sleep even when the sun's shining.
example.egtrans: 多亏了我的好朋友艾伦，我才能准时到达机场。多亏了窗户前厚重的窗帘，即使外面阳光明媚，我也能安然入睡。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…的帮助下, 多亏了

example.eg: Thanks to my son hogging the bathroom this morning, I was late for work.
example.egtrans: 由于今早浴室被儿子霸占，我上班迟到了。

example.eg: Thanks be to God, when I lost control of my car there were no other vehicles nearby.
